name: 電腦輔助英語學習
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENU0038  語言習得】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: To familiarize students with “what have been done” and “what can possibly be done” by using computer technologies in language teaching and learning, the loosest sense of computer assisted language learning (CALL)
To know what CALL can and what CALL can not be incorporated in English classrooms in Taiwan
To equip students with some basic skills in creating multimedia courseware, online (web-based) and offline, for their future teaching

methodologies.note: Explain how technology can help language learning and teaching.

Integrate various kinds of media in class presentations.
